has research problem.from sentence: However , the ability to populate knowledge bases with facts automatically extracted from documents has improved frustratingly slowly .

has research problem: populate a knowledge base with relational facts

has research problem.from sentence: A basic but highly important challenge in natural language understanding is being able to populate a knowledge base with relational facts contained in a piece of text .
Existing work on relation extraction ( e.g. , has been unable to achieve sufficient recall or precision for the results to be usable versus hand - constructed knowledge bases .
